meanings.sent1: The overalert cat noticed every little sound in the house.
meanings.sent2: She became overalert after watching a scary movie.
meanings.sent3: The overalert squirrel mistook a falling leaf for a predator.
meanings.sent4: His overalert senses picked up on the slightest change in the environment.
meanings.sent5: The overalert security guard never missed a single movement in the building.

meanings.definition: to be excessively vigilant or watchful
meanings.sent1: The parents overalerted when their child wandered off in the park.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overalert whenever he hears a strange noise at night.
meanings.sent3: The detective overalerted about every detail, even the ones that didn't matter.
meanings.sent4: She would overalert at the smallest sign of danger, ready to react instantly.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's training made him overalert to any potential threats in the area.
